extendedInfo.description: Enjoy St James Way in Augmented Reality! Walk through mountains and villages while you have your way in your smartphone!Augmented Reality will show you where you can go and what to visit. Augmented Reality St James Way will show you many different points of interest like hostels, hotels, restaurants, monuments and much more!Don't you know where to sleep or eat? Take your smartphone, launch Augmented Reality St James Way and turn around to see where to go!It has many different routes to take, like the French route or the North route, but much more are coming!It also has the possibility to locate yourself along the route in Google Maps.Have a nice trip!
